headline: BMO Capital Lowers Duke Energy (DUK) Price Target
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is included among the 10 Best Renewable Energy Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) engages in the distribution of natural gas and energy-related services. The company owns and operates a diverse mix of regulated power plants – including hydro, coal, nuclear, natural gas, solar, and battery storage. On […]
